pr_title: Removal of automatically added 'query' parameter for entries subpath

timeline.message: 74271: [Issue 2954] External Sources "entries" subpath should not include "query" parameter by default

timeline.bodyText: this actually demonstrate the existence of the bug and the solution, so if we wan't to deal with URI template this PR can be accepted
timeline.author: abollini
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -22,7 +23,9 @@ private ExternalSourceMatcher() {
         return allOf(
             hasJsonPath("$.id", is(id)),
             hasJsonPath("$.name", is(name)),
-            hasJsonPath("$.hierarchical", is(hierarchical))
+            hasJsonPath("$.hierarchical", is(hierarchical)),
+            hasJsonPath("$._links.entries.href", is(REST_SERVER_URL +
+                                                            "integration/externalsources/" + name + "/entries"))
